Package timeclock.workers

Contains all of the SwingWorker classes used by the TimeClock GUI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEmployeeWorker
    SwingWorker that will add the employee to the DB and then call an update to the GUI.
    ClockInWorker
    SwingWorker that clocks in an employee and updates the GUI Employee list.
    ClockOutWorker
    SwingWorker that clocks out an employee and updates the GUI Employee list.
    CreateReportWorker
    SwingWorker that prints all time punches to the debugger for now.
    DeleteEmployeeWorker
    SwingWorker that deletes all timepunches, the employee from the database and then updates the GUI Employee list.
    EditEmployeeWorker
    SwingWorker that updates the Employee in the database, and also updates the GUI Employee list.
    EmployeeTimeReportWorker
    SwingWorker that creates the time report for the selected Employee.
    ListEmployeesWorker
    SwingWorker that creates a report of all Employees in the database.
    WhoIsClockedInWorker
    SwingWorker that get a list of all Employees currently clocked in.

Package timeclock.workers Description

Contains all of the SwingWorker classes used by the TimeClock GUI.
